events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item delivered, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so that I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing that I received a different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund, and you should see the money back on your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks, Sarah! I appreciate your quick help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund issue has been resolved. Customer informed of refund processing and expected timeframe.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully processed and confirmed, the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
